steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Click on the 'Insert' tab in the ribbon.
In the 'Text' group, click on the 'Object' button.
A calendar object will be inserted into the document.
Customize the calendar by selecting the desired options, such as the date range and style.
Click on the 'File' tab in the ribbon.
Select 'Save' to save the changes to the document.
